subject: Horse Racing
Belmont Stakes
lead_paragraph: Although no firm plans have been made for the Belmont Stakes winner Rags to Riches beyond her next scheduled start, it appears she may not face colts for the rest of the year.
snippet: Although no firm plans have been made for the Belmont Stakes winner Rags to Riches beyond her next scheduled start, it appears she may not face colts for the rest of the year.
